alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 25 at 12:32PM EDT until March 25 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EDT FOR FAYETTE...CLINTON...SOUTHEASTERN GREENE AND NORTHERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES... At 1232 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jeffersonville to near Lynchburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Wilmington, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Blanchester, Sabina, Mount Sterling, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Jeffersonville, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Staunton, Good Hope, Martinsville, Midland, Bowersville, Highland and Milledgeville. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 56 and 77. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
